title: European Insider-Owned Growth Companies To Watch In December 2025
description: As European markets experience a notable upswing, with the STOXX Europe 600 Index and major single-country stock indexes posting gains, investor attention has increasingly turned towards growth companies exhibiting strong insider ownership. title: India, Portugal to boost trade, defence ties
description:
India and Portugal have agreed to further strengthen their partnership across key areas, including trade, defence, renewable energy and education, as both nations mark the 50th anniversary of the re-establishment of diplomatic ties this year.
